name: Knowles Corporation
description: Knowles Corporation is a global leader in advanced micro-acoustic microphones and audio processing technologies. Established in 1946 and headquartered in Itasca, Illinois, Knowles has carved a niche for itself in the consumer electronics and industrial markets by providing high-performance audio solutions that enhance voice recognition, sound quality, and overall user experience. The company's innovative products are widely used in smartphones, wearables, smart home devices, and other consumer electronics, as well as in hearing aids and other medical devices. Knowles is particularly recognized for its MEMS (Micro-Electro-Mechanical Systems) microphones, which deliver superior sound quality in compact form factors. The company is committed to driving innovation and meeting the evolving demands of the audio market by investing in research and development, ensuring that it remains at the forefront of audio technology. Knowles aims to improve the sound experience for users around the globe, focusing on delivering products that integrate seamlessly into various applications. With a strong emphasis on quality and performance, Knowles continues to push the boundaries of audio technology, setting new standards in the industry.
